prompt:
Professional corporate presentation slide design. Bright modern background with Dubai skyline and Burj Khalifa in warm golden morning light. Confident executive figure on right side. Holographic AI charts floating subtly.

Text overlay in elegant dark blue and gold typography:

Large headline at top: 'Strategic Clarity in 2 Days'

Subheadline: 'Four actionable deliverables you will walk away with:'

Four boxes or sections showing:
1. AI Mandate Map - Your roadmap from generic directive to concrete action
2. Investment Filter - 6-8 questions to separate real capability from hype
3. Risk Guardrail - Red-line cases, approvals, oversight roles defined
4. 90-Day Action Memo - Quick win + strategic initiative, board-ready

Bottom section: 'Format: 2 Full Days OR 4 Evening Sessions | Limited to 15 Executives'

Footer: 'Practitioner-Led | GCC Context | UAE HR Accredited'

Premium corporate slide design, bright optimistic mood, blue and gold color scheme, clean modern layout, professional presentation aesthetic.
